feed.title: Aurora Warms the Night
feed.subtitle: Posts from Aurora Warms the Night

entry.title: Aurora Warms the Night is working hard to keep up with the...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

Aurora Warms the Night is working hard to keep up with the extraordinary needs of our homeless friends. There are twice the amount of homeless people while resources and funding has declined drastically. Your donation saves lives and helps us retain our dedicated staff. http://www.aurorawarmsthenight.org/donate.html

entry.title: My only wish today is that all my friends, the friends I've...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

My only wish today is that all my friends, the friends I've yet to meet, and the people I serve feel healthy, happy, and loved. Warms wishes from the staff and at Aurora Warms the Night. #homeless #eastcolfax #donate http://www.aurorawarmsthenight.org/donate.html

entry.title: Homelessness has become an epidemic and smaller non-profits like...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night is in East Colfax.

Homelessness has become an epidemic and smaller non-profits like Aurora Warms the Night are struggling to keep up. Your donation is incredibly significant as we continue to keep people warms and safe during these winter months. http://www.aurorawarmsthenight.org/donate.html #Homeless #donor

entry.title: We are in need of a vehicle to tow our 30ft shower trailer and a...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

We are in need of a vehicle to tow our 30ft shower trailer and a transport van for food and other supplies. Any support is greatly appreciated.

entry.title: With the homeless population nearly double what it was last...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

With the homeless population nearly double what it was last year, funding from donors is our only hope to keep up with the massive needs on the streets of East Colfax. As the year comes to an end your donation is lifechanging for our homeless friends. Thank you for your support! #Homeless #donate http://www.aurorawarmsthenight.org/donate.html

entry.title: Wow! This outpouring of donations has been incredible! Thank you...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

Wow! This outpouring of donations has been incredible! Thank you to everyone who contributed! #homeless #donate

entry.title: It's Colorado Gives Day!! Thank you for your continued...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

It's Colorado Gives Day!! Thank you for your continued support. Donate Here: https://www.coloradogives.org/AuroraWarmstheNight/overview

MAILING and DONATION DROP OFF ADDRESS:
9360 E Colfax Ave.
Aurora, CO 80010

Open: Mon - Thurs 9:30 - 2pm
For donations outside of these hours please call 303-343-0537 to schedule another time.

Aurora Warms the Night
